July 1
â€¢ Got onboarded as Data Analysis Intern
â€¢ Went through the internship handbook and the training modules

July 2
â€¢ Brushed up on Metabase to strengthen understanding

the available datasets

July 3

â€¢ Attended weekly review call
Next
â€¢ Connect filters and enable deeper drill-down interactions.

â€¢ Get new task assigned
